talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>The room will be done with just four
blue nightshades and two big
brightbloom seeds...
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Whee! Thank you, thank you!<sp:5:0:0> Hang onâ€”
I'll set up the decorations real quick!
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>No touchy! Each element has been placed
just so!
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00><clr:0000>Four<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>blue nightshades<clr:ffff> that glow
gently at night, and <clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> super-bright
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>That's all I need to finish my

talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>See, look! Now my secret room is
all done!
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Whoa, really? Thanks!<sp:5:0:0> But it's not
evening yet...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It'll be so much prettier in the dark, so I
want you to stay until nighttime.<sp:5:1:0> OK?
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Really? Let me see...<sp:5:1:0> No, no. You don't
have enough.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>What I want is <clr:0000>four blue nightshades<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> large <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>Awww... <sp:5:1:0>But if you change your mind, I'd
be super happy if you brought me things
to decorate my secret room.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I was thinking I'd lay this on the floor like
a rug, but you can have it!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Now I can enjoy my secret room, and it's
all thanks to you, Mr. Hero!
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Wakeup_00>*yaaawn*<sp:5:0:0> OK. It's dark enough now.
Can I have the pretty stuff now?
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Ah! I've been spotted!<sp:5:1:0> I wonder how you
got in here...
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, guess what!<sp:5:0:0> We're in the Great
Deku Tree's mouth. Guess what else! <sp:5:0:0>I'm
putting together a SECRET room here!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Right now I'm fixing up the decor. But I
need more pretty things...

I need <clr:0000>four<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>blue nightshades<clr:ffff> that glow
gently at night, and <clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> really vivid
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>For the brightbloom seeds, I'm looking for
something <clr:0000>bigger <clr:ffff>than what you can find
in the General Shoppe.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>That's all I need to finish my
super-secret room...
